CommandTexts.CommandText: SELECT DISTINCT a.COLUMN_NAME AS "Name", a.COLUMN_NAME AS "PropertyName", CASE WHEN a.DATA_TYPE='NUMBER' AND a.DATA_SCALE=0 THEN 'number1' WHEN a.DATA_TYPE='NUMBER' AND a.DATA_SCALE<>0 THEN 'number2' ELSE a.DATA_TYPE END AS "DataType", a.CHAR_LENGTH AS "DataLength", CASE WHEN c.COLUMN_NAME IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS "IsPrimaryKey", CASE a.NULLABLE WHEN 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "IsNullable", 0 AS "IsIdentity", '' AS "DataDefault", CASE WHEN B.COMMENTS IS NULL THEN A.COLUMN_NAME ELSE b.COMMENTS END AS "Description", a.COLUMN_ID AS "Sort" FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS a LEFT JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS b ON a.TABLE_NAME=b.TABLE_NAME AND a.COLUMN_NAME=b.COLUMN_NAME LEFT JOIN USER_CONS_COLUMNS c ON a.TABLE_NAME=c.TABLE_NAME AND a.COLUMN_NAME=c.COLUMN_NAME LEFT JOIN USER_CONSTRAINTS d ON c.CONSTRAINT_NAME=d.CONSTRAINT_NAME AND D.CONSTRAINT_TYPE='P' WHERE A.TABLE_NAME=:ptable ORDER BY a.COLUMN_ID
